title: Chennai to Pondicherry French Getaway
overview: Experience the French Riviera of the East with its charming white town and serene beaches.

itinerary.title: Arrival & White Town
itinerary.desc: Drive from Chennai, explore the French colony and cafes.

itinerary.title: Auroville & Departure
itinerary.desc: Visit Auroville and Paradise beach before heading back.
